name: TimeNotes Free
description:
Are you bored with the same questions and events in every quiz game?
Do you want to try something new?
Are you up for the task?
To build the longest streak of dates?
To be the best in the hardest and most entertaining quiz game ever?
To test your knowledge, and become the best in the Ultimate Challenge?

More than 22.000 unique events!

14 categories:
- movie, film
- music
- transportation
- video games
- board games
- anime, manga
- literature
- comic books, graphic novels
- science
- sport
- history
- art
- nature
- religion

Customizable interface.

2 game modes:
- challenge
- infinity

Full gameplay customization.

2 skins:
- normal
- classical

Superhard achievements for the most determined players!
From AK-17 apps, the creators of RallyRaid.
Let's see how educated you are!

https://ak17apps.com/timenotes.php
